titleStmt.title: Orders agreed upon, and published by the vicechancellour and maior of the Vniversitie and town of Cambridge and the justices of both bodies, and the doctors and aldermen their assistants.
titleStmt.author: University of Cambridge.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
With: Articles and orders agreed vpon by the Right Worshipfull Iohn Mansel ... [Cambridge : s.n., 1625].
